title: BRIEF-ACCC Says It Will Not Oppose Acquisition Of Lion Dairy & Drinks’ Cheese Business By Saputo Dairy Australia
text:
BRIEF-ACCC Says It Will Not Oppose Acquisition Of Lion Dairy & Drinks’ Cheese Business By Saputo Dairy Australia

Stock Markets 2 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 21:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-ACCC Says It Will Not Oppose Acquisition Of Lion Dairy & Drinks’ Cheese Business By Saputo Dairy Australia Sept 26 (Reuters) - Saputo Inc : * AUSTRALIAN COMPETITION AND CONSUMER COMMISSION SAYS IT WILL NOT OPPOSE ACQUISITION OF LION DAIRY & DRINKS' CHEESE BUSINESS BY SAPUTO DAIRY AUSTRALIA * "WE DO NOT THINK THIS ACQUISITION IS LIKELY TO HAVE THE EFFECT OF SUBSTANTIALLY LESSENING COMPETITION" * ACKNOWLEDGES SIGNIFICANT CONCENTRATION IN TASMANIAN DAIRY SECTOR & ANY FURTHER CONSOLIDATION OF DAIRY PROCESSORS WILL CAUSE SIGNIFICANT CONCERN * ALSO EXAMINED THE IMPACT OF THE PROPOSED ACQUISITION ON THE SUPPLY OF CHEESE IN AUSTRALIA

BRIEF-ACCC Says It Will Not Oppose Acquisition Of Lion Dairy & Drinks’ Cheese Business By Saputo Dairy Australia
description: BRIEF-ACCC Says It Will Not Oppose Acquisition Of Lion Dairy & Drinks’ Cheese Business By Saputo Dairy Australia
